title: New Business Classification
body:
In the past people have referred to The Moxie as a "Mom and Pop" operation. But that's not quite true, since we don't have kids. But come early December, you can officially call us a "Mom and Pop" business!

It's going to be an exciting (and probably terrifying!) transition, but we couldn't wait to share with you!
author: Nicole

comments.author: Girl #2
comments.body:
yay! I'm gonna nickname the new baby "popcorn" if it's a girl or "fitz" if it's a boy. 

or perhaps a more fitting nickname (boy or girl): "intermission half-way through"

comments.author: stevie_g
comments.body:
Wow! First and foremost, congratulations!

Yet other thoughts came to mind as I read this:

1. Have you told Dan yet?

2. At last! An heir to the Moxie empire!

3. Oh great, another Cardinal fan...

Seriously, this is so cool. I'm so happy for you both.

comments.author: Duke1974
comments.body:
Congratulations Dan & Nicole.

And while I'm here Happy 4th of July America!

M

comments.author: maxcue
comments.body: Congratulations from Dr. Dave Stone on your upcoming new employee, er, child. You are a great couple and work so hard to make the community better. What a lucky child this will be.

comments.author: Paul
comments.body: Congratulations Dan & Nicole!  Looking forward to meeting the little one with the sly sense of humor and work ethic you two possess!
